query: 'select c.cust_no 'Customer ID', c.cust_name 'Customer Name', case when ((r.amt > 0) and (c.terms_code is null or c.terms_code = '')) then s.code_desc else s2.code_desc end as 'Terms', 
r.doc_date 'Invoice Date', r.due_date 'Due Date', r.amt 'Balance'
from aropen r
left join customer c on c.cust_no = r.cust_no
left join codes s on s.code_id = c.terms_code and s.code_type = 'T'
left join inv_hedr h on h.inv_no = r.doc_no
left join codes s2 on s2.code_id = h.terms_code and s2.code_type = 'T' 
where r.doc_type = 'I' and r.doc_no not like 'UK%'
group by r.aropen_rec, c.cust_no, c.cust_name, case when ((r.amt > 0) and (c.terms_code is null or c.terms_code = '')) then s.code_desc else s2.code_desc end, 
r.doc_date, r.due_date, r.amt
union all
select  c.cust_no 'Customer ID', c.cust_name 'Customer Name','NULL' as 'Terms', 
r.doc_date 'Invoice Date', r.due_date 'Due Date', r.amt 'Balance'
from aropen r
left join customer c on c.cust_no = r.cust_no
where r.doc_type = 'I' and r.doc_no like 'UK%'
group by r.aropen_rec, c.cust_no, c.cust_name, 
r.doc_date, r.due_date, r.amt
union all
select c.cust_no 'Customer ID', c.cust_name 'Customer Name','NULL' as 'Terms', 
r.doc_date 'Invoice Date', r.due_date 'Due Date', r.amt 'Balance'
from aropen r
left join customer c on c.cust_no = r.cust_no
where r.doc_type <> 'I'
group by r.aropen_rec, c.cust_no, c.cust_name, 
r.doc_date, r.due_date, r.amt
',
